interpretation:
The "right arrow curving left" represents a sudden change in direction, often indicating a reversal of plans or a need to backtrack. This card suggests that you may be facing a situation where you need to reconsider your current path and make adjustments to reach your goals. It can also indicate a need to take a step back and reassess your situation before moving forward.

This card may also suggest a change of heart or a change in perspective that could lead to a new and more positive direction. It is important to be flexible and open-minded during this time, as unexpected changes can often lead to new opportunities and growth.

Overall, the "right arrow curving left" reminds us that change is inevitable and sometimes necessary. Embrace the unknown and trust that you have the ability to adapt and thrive in any situation.
